original_title: The Adventures of Timmy the Tooth: Malibu Timmy
overview: Timmy and his friends go to the beach, but there is just one problem: Timmy cannot swim, and neither can Waxie! Timmy then imagines himself as a lifeguard, and his friends are competing in a surfing competition against the notorious cheater Goon Doggy.

production_companies.name: Universal Studios Home Entertainment Family Productions

title: The Adventures of Timmy the Tooth: Malibu Timmy
